actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code in order to increase the subsistence allowances payable to veterans pursuing vocational rehabilitation training.

summary.text: Increases the subsistence allowances and training assistance allowances payable to veterans pursuing vocational rehabilitation training. (Amends 38 U.S.C. 1504(b), 1787(b).)

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code in order to increase the subsistence allowances payable to veterans pursuing vocational rehabilitation training.
